BUG DESCRIPTION
===============

BUG: Wrong formula

BUGGY LINE:
    security_score = len(state) + len(scope) * 10

FIXED LINE:
    security_score = len(state) / 32 * 50 + len(scope) * 10

EXPLANATION:
Security score should normalize state length
Result is used in return value

IMPACT: oauth flow produces incorrect results
PRIORITY: P2
